text: Ramón Juárez Del Castillo (born 9 May 2001) is a Mexican footballer who currently plays as a defender for Club América. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Club América Premier |2019–20 |Liga Premier Serie A |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- | rowspan=2|Club América |2019–20 |Liga MX |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- |2020–21 |Liga MX |7||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||7||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !12!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!12!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexico youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Club América footballers Category:Liga MX players
